name: Sheena Addison
text: I usually order from this place online at least twice a month they make really great pizza and are always on time.

name: Ukvayat Hanak
text: Great atmosphere, clean, and well serviced. Our server even asked if we wanted to-go drinks. The buffet was kept full and hot. Salad bar was fresh as well. A great restaurant for a small town.

name: Becca Barker
text: Best time to go is during the week day lunch buffet. Pizza fresh early but not toward end of lunch. Good food, just really need better dessert choices. They do not have any type of meat on salad bar. Kind of limited choices. Wait staff is the best. So friendly and always helpful.

name: TREVA WRIGHT
text: GOOD FOOD, GREAT SERVICE!

name: Rachel Coombes
text: Columbus pizza hut has the best buffet around. They strive to please!!!!

name: Tuesday W
text: The management has changed and it's a great improvement. A teenage waitress was unprofessional and unfriendly but the boss made up for it. The only reason for the 4 instead of 5 because they don't honor all the pizza hut deals I've seen …More

name: Aaron Smith
text: Good customer service to an extent, they messed up our order. Took an hour to make it right with us. Then they forgot to give us our pasta before leaving when I was paged out to a medical call. Rated 1 of 5. Order something simple and you should be alright.

name: Joann Moore
text: Very clean, very friendly service, great food, and the bathroom was clean. I love this pizza hut. They have the best pizza and a great salad bar. We always eat here when we're in town. We always have a supreme pizza and wings, I love their pan bread with cheese and jalapeno, yummm...

name: Donna Helms
text: Food was good and hot. service was not so good the server didnt even bring plates we had to ask for them. The building itself was nice and clean

name: Cody Zook
text: Placed order, got pizza, got home. Didn’t match our order. Should have checked. Called, drove all the way back. Received another wrong pizza. Receipt plainly stated what was ordered. Night manager on January 26,2018 slammed window. Great service! Maybe I’ll have the correct order 1 1/2 hrs later

name: Roy Parsons
text: Great choice of pizza pieces & great service.

name: Bev Burton
text: Buffet today for a birthday lunch buffet, arriving at 12:30. Long story short is it cost $22.15 for 2 dried pizza slices & wrong drinks & a few cinnamon sticks. Buffet lacks fresh pizza every time I go there!

name: Nerdz Hype
text: The place is currently packed and I've only seen one server. She's great at keeping up and everyone is staying busy. Great training and excellent service.

name: Darrell Thompson
text: Good food and e service

name: Bobby Perry
text: Amazing customer service. And food is good to

name: Marie Sherman
text: Yummy try the garlic knots

name: Teresa McLean
text: Pizza and service are always good here.  My only complaint is the lack of Pepsi.  I don't know why, since PepsiCo owns Pizza Hut, this franchise location serves Coke products.

name: Billiesue Roark
text: I loved it it was great. The waitress is awesome the other employees are friendly. Great experience every time.

name: Jimmy Escobar
text: Food is always prompt and service is great

name: Julie Kellogg
text: This is a great place to eat! The food is wonderful and the staff is even better.

name: Scott dennison
text: Good food,friendly people

name: Michael McCormick
text: Our food was so good and Zech was very nice.

name: S D
text: Had lunch with my family today. The buffet was hot and full. We had the best service I've had in a long time, by a nice young man.

name: Tim Thomas
text: It's really gone down hill recently. Terrible service, unless you like waiting 40 minutes for your first drink. It seems twice as long for your food. Even when there is only a couple of people there. You don't even want to know about the salad bar. (Sad but true)!!!

name: Gerald messer
text: good lunch buffet

name: Joe Maghe
text: Food was good but service was horrible

name: Jeremy Frost
text: Friendly staff along with great food but missing one star due to a unprecedented wait time. Note that I didn't say it was a long wait but due to the fact I was the only customer at the time it seemed long. But the kids enjoyed the staff definite family place

name: Todd Brennfoerder
text: Not the best Pizza Hut buffet I've been to. Options on the buffet didn't really change, salad bar was very basic, left a little disappointed.

name: Rachel Coombes
text: This is the best Pizza hut in the area..Great buffet selections.

name: Mavis Bowin
text: We ate here on Sunday, July 23, 2017.  There were customers that came in after us that had their orders taken and food served before we even had our order taken.  The server brought us a sandwich that we had not ordered.  We never got the …More

name: Sally Crabb
text: Today was a good day at Pizza Hut. Enjoy a nice salad and personal pan pizza for lunch on Sunday. Friendly servers are helpful and nice.

name: Brittanie Stone
text: Fast and very nice service. Awesome pizza

name: Danica Hammonds
text: best place in town

name: Jinxo 2020
text: Passed thru town.  We had excellent service.  Food was fast  warm and was delicious.

name: Mary Kimball
text: service is poor, sanitation issues, but a great place to get a free meal, they are against reporting dine and dashes!

name: Melia Elliott
text: Decent buffet with pizza, pasta, salad, and dessert options at lunch.

name: Robert Wuerdeman
text: This is one of the friendliest restaurants I have been to.

name: Billie Roark
text: They always have good specials friendly staff and great food

name: Adam Ellison
text: Pizza was good... don't like that it took 35 minutes to make it.

name: Beckie Wilson
text: Good food and prices

name: soltic
text: Very friendly and they make a great pizza.

name: Larry Ketcher
text: Excellent food and service.

name: Michael Ashley
text: Good pizza

name: Thomas Butterfield
text: Waited my whole meal and never did gets the drinks we ordered.

name: Krissy Andrews
text: Awesome service!!!

name: Tyson Coombes
text: It was really yummy!

name: Roseann patterson
text: It's ok.

name: Kim Allen
text: Always good

name: Shelley Paradee
text: Good place

name: Becky McArthur
text: Love it

name: Dj Wimprt
text: Service sucks

name: Amanda Sims
text: Fun staff

name: E Arthur Robertson
text: Good, convenient food.

name: Denise Robinson
text: Delicious!!!!!!!!

name: Mike Clouser
text: Great food

name: wade messer
text: Wrong order again. What is wrong with this place? I am guessing its management. Girl on the phone was rude when i called to tell them my order was wrong.

name: Michael Riley
text: Dine in service was terrible. Our order was not right and pizza was under cooked

name: Kenna Christiansen
text: Worst ever sit for 10 min with out one person coming to table there where ants all over the table and there was only 4 tables occupied worst ever
